user.title: Set up Rvik Razor
user.description: Select the energy sensor that tracks your hourly energy consumption.

power_sensor.title: Power sensor (optional)
power_sensor.description: Select a power sensor for better predictions. This is recommended but not required.

limits.title: Set limits
limits.description: Configure the maximum hourly energy limit and operation mode.

error.entity_not_found: The selected entity was not found

init.title: Manage Rvik Razor
init.description:
Configure system settings and manage your loads. Use the list below to edit settings, add new loads, or modify existing ones.

**Total loads configured:** {load_count}

add_load.title: Add a new load
add_load.description: Configure a new controllable load. Priority determines which loads are reduced first (lower numbers are reduced first).

data.name: Load name
data.enabled_entity: Enabled entity (optional, e.g., car charging sensor)

add_ev_load.title: Configure EV charger
add_ev_load.description: Configure the EV charger amperage control settings. Power will be calculated from ampere/voltage/phases if no sensor provided.

add_switch_load.title: Configure switch load
add_switch_load.description: Configure a switch-based load (e.g., heat pump). Either power sensor or assumed power is recommended for accurate regulation.

data.assumed_power_kw: Assumed power when on (optional, if no sensor)

edit_ev_load.title: Edit EV charger load
edit_ev_load.description: Update the EV charger configuration. Power will be calculated from ampere/voltage/phases if no sensor provided.

data.name: Load name
data.enabled_entity: Enabled entity (optional, e.g., car charging sensor)

edit_switch_load.title: Edit switch load
edit_switch_load.description: Update the switch load configuration. Either power sensor or assumed power is recommended for accurate regulation.

data.name: Load name
data.enabled_entity: Enabled entity (optional, e.g., car charging sensor)
data.assumed_power_kw: Assumed power when on (optional, if no sensor)

edit_limits.title: Edit limits
edit_limits.description: Update the maximum hourly energy limit and operation mode.
